text: <@UQWGKUEN7> thanks for your assistance yesterday, if you or anyone else has any thoughts on how I can get to the bottom of the issue I’m all ears
<@U030XEP3QPN> You’re certain that add_faq is also a repeater group? Seems like it should be — but just double checking.

Yep, it’s definitely a repeater. Looping over the `add_faq` items works fine, and looping over their existing fields also works, though for some reason it’s only looping over any new fields that doesn’t work

For anyone looking into this, was a really strange caching issue where I needed to check the preview before publishing the new fields, then the values appeared as expected on the front end :man-shrugging:
